trHeaderSub: For more original mods, maps and gaming content, subscribe to AzzaFortysix on YouTube.
trMessage1: Make sure you tell the devs of the game that you want modding to be allowed, or we may lose modding (and this level editor) forever!
trMessage2: Go and post on the Steam Discussion boards & SubReddit (/r/TheyAreBillions), post anywhere else you can think of where you think the devs may see the message.
trMessage3: The game devs are banning modders from the forums and trying to prevent tools such as this map editor from being released to the community.
trExplainWhatBody1: This is a save file editor for "They Are Billions".
trExplainWhatBody2: It allows you to edit save files relatively easily.
trExplainHowBody1: Press "control + F5" to ensure you have the latest version of the app.
trExplainHowBody2: Load a "They Are Billions" save file.
trExplainHowBody3: Save files can be found in "My Documents" --> "My Games" --> "They Are Billions" --> "Saves".
trExplainHowBody4: Select one of the ".zxsav" files to begin the editing process.
trFeatureToggleInfo1: The devs of the game have once again broken the level editor. (likely on purpose)
trFeatureToggleInfo2: To combat the this editor being constantly broken, we have added the option to enable and disable editor features.
trFeatureToggleInfo3: You should only enable the features you intend to actually use, this way the editor won't modify every part of the game file, and you can avoid editing things that are currently broken.
trTutorials_114_3: Help! My .ZXCheck file is invalid! The new method to create a ZXCheck file.
trTutorials_110: Map settings, Raw XML & Delete All of this Entity
trTutorials_104: Usability #1 - Undo, Redo, Menu Bug Fixes, New Tools, Map Props Editor
trTutorials_103: Wave Editor, Entity Cloning & Deleting Dev VLog
trHelpTranslations_01: This level editor fully supports translations.
trHelpTranslations_02: The language files are stored here
trHelpTranslations_03: There is one file for each language.
trHelpTranslations_04: Create a pull request on the repository to submit updated language files.
trHelpTranslations_05: Look in the browser's console for any missing translations.
trHelpEntitySelection: Select an entity to view it's properties.
trErrorInvalidSaveFile: This does not appear to be a valid "They Are Billions" save file. It is missing "Data" or "Info".
trErrorMultipleFilesSelected: Please select ONLY ONE "They Are Billions" save file.
trErrorUndoNothingLeft: There is nothing left to undo.
trErrorRedoNothingLeft: There is nothing left to redo.
trErrorNoEntityReference: Failed to get a reference to the entity!
trConfirmDeleteMap: Are you sure you want to delete {{mapName}}?
trConfirmDeleteEntity: Are you sure you want to delete {{entityName}}?
trConfirmDeleteEntityAll: Are you sure you want to delete EVERY {{entityName}}?
trConfirmDeleteAllZombies: Are you sure you want to delete EVERY hidden zombie?
trSuccessRemoveEveryZombie: Every hidden zombie has been removed.
trConfirmDeleteAllEntities: Are you sure you want to delete EVERY entity? Note: Unit generators and the command centre will remain.
trSuccessRemoveEveryEntities: Every entity except command centre and unit generators was removed.
trRecentMapsDisabled: We have disabled this feature or now because this feature uses a lot of RAM and local resources, as well as CPU when saving / loading maps.
trChangeLogBody_114_01: Added a visual zombie editor so that zombies within the fog of war can be edited.
trChangeLogBody_113_01: Added options to delete all hidden zombies and entities via map settings menu.
trChangeLogBody_113_02: Started to improve performance of editor.
trChangeLogBody_112_02: Changed the user interface on the left side so it is less squashed.
trChangeLogBody_110_02: Added delete all of an entity type.
trChangeLogBody_109_01: Added entity tool which lets you add new entities onto the map.
trChangeLogBody_107_02: Changed layout of brushes into seperate sections to save space.
trChangeLogBody_107_03: Fixed issues with oil entity editor.
trChangeLogBody_106_03: Improved accuracy and size of entities.
trChangeLogBody_106_04: Added toggle option for entity labels.
trChangeLogBody_104_03: Fixed entity menu closing when deleting / cloning entities.
trChangeLogBody_103_02: Added Wave Editor to change how waves spawn.
trChangeLogBody_100_02: Updated editor to be more useable (zooming, brush size, scrolling).
trChangeLogBody_100_03: Added the ability to export the map.
trChangeLogBody_100_04: Added the ability to edit the terrain and resources on a map.
trChangeLogBody_100_05: Added the ability to load save files.
trDiscount1: For a 10% discount on They Are Billions and other games, use this link. It won't be valid for long!
trCheckInfo: The .ZXCheck generation process on this website is broken for version 6.0 and beyond. If you want to sign your map for v6.0 and newer, you can use this tool to sign the file. We are working towards adding support for the version 6.0 .zxcheck format.
